1.content:
Okay despite that really weird intro this is your basic Shrink Story, with a few little additions here and there. First off this story is divided into three parts. The first part is kind of like the Virgin Tell Interactive here on Writing.com where you answer questions, like why are you into the macrophile thing? Is it a self-annihilation fantasy, or just something you're into for no reason you can identify? What kind of Macro do you like? Vore, crushing, or just looking at people at a significantly lower POV? How about the giant? Do you prefer guy, girl, animal? And finally how about your favorite place on the net for your fetish? What site do you go to? If it's here on Writing.com then what's your favorite story? And once you've answered as many of these questions as you want, maybe even thinking of a few of your own. After that leave a single link open for the next person.


Now for the real story, this is as usual divided up into two parts, both male and female. Both POVs start shortly after the character(Steve Marshall for the guys Andrea Watts for the girls) arrives home after signing up for the MA program. The first choice for each one is to identify what kind of companion they choose, a vore, a crushing, an animal(Those will come with a trainer to give you the shrink and explain the commands), or an anthromorph .

Addition: You may now chose to play the story from the view point of the MA person sent to help someone live out their fantasy. Choose first your Gender, then you type(Human, Anthro, Android, Animal, or other), and then the origin of your POV.

Ok choice time, do you want to tell us about your fetish, and more importantly add a link that some of us might not have heard of, or do you want to go to the story?
1.title: A choice of paths

11.content:
Okay since this is my parade I guess I have to go first.

Why am I into Macrophile stuff?
Quite simple, it is my self annihilation fantasy. Everyone has an SA, because we all feel guilty about something. If you've ever watched the scifi show Star Trek: Deep Space Nine(On weekdays 10:00am-Noon[Central] on Spike TV) then you may have noticed that the Doctor of the station and the Chief Engineer regularly make trips to the holosuite(a high tech enviornment simulator) to live out hopeless battles like the Alamo from the losing side, where they have no chance of living through it. These kinds of fantasies are a normal reaction to living, as even the most heartless person feels guilty about something, even if they don't admit it, and these fantasies are actually a way of atonement. I'm probably also into it because I've always been a head taller than my age group, standing at around 6'8" now at age twenty, and so I've never been small, and its always been an interest to wonder what it's like to be tiny.

What kind of macro am I into?
Well mostly vore, usually sandwich is preferred, and usually unknowing on the part of the giantess. I don't know why but having them know you're there just kind of takes some of the fun out of it, though certainly not all of it. I can get into the POV stomp photos, but I still prefer a good vore story or clip. As stated above I'm more into the giantess stuff, though I won't say no to an animal vore story. We have plenty of those here on Writing.com

My favorite place on the net for this?
Well I like the Big Gulp even though it's just a web archive now. They still have great stories there, even if some of the links are broken. Site address is: http://web.archive.org/web/2003040217480...

1111111111.content:
Vinnyloo here,

I would have to say that my macrophile fantasy has grown a lot since I was a little boy. I was quite advanced, and VERY early on, perhaps in kindergarten fantasies of being shrunk were very present - I distinctly remember imagining my kindergarten teacher 'bottling' me and the rest of the students, and then stashing the bottles away in a cabinet. I also remember imagining that me, and this girl I was friends with, had both been shrunk along with many in the class, and the rest of the class was using us in an 'arts and crafts' project, wrapping us up in clay to take home and keep. The girl who got us was a girl I thought was cute, but was kinda mean and spoiled, and she thoroughly enjoying teasing me and my friend as she wrapped us up in clay to take home. I realize that these fantasies sound a bit complex for a kid, but I assure you, they are what I thought about.

As I got older, I began to have more fantasies come into being - and being shrunk just naturally became part of them, along with the helplessness and humiliation. The bigger the girl, the more helpless I would be, and the more 'playful cruelty' she could deliver without getting caught. It has always been from the shrunken perspective with me, for various reasons: The girl would be able to go about her day as usual, being normal sized, while I was already meek and helpless from the start, in danger simply from being in the giant world around me. Also, it would be easy for the girl to keep a tiny boy (perhaps an inch tall or smaller) a secret from anyone who would want to help. There could be prolonged episodes of 'torture', with little or no hope for escape.

Generally, my fantasies became more focused on one thing - being tiny, helpless, and mashed into a completely beaten and immobile state under the giant smelly sole of a pretty girl's foot. Then, in that state, to see her causally moving her huge foot around, and to see her giant, pretty face, grinning down as if it was just a funny game. Often my friends that were girls would become the subject of these fantasies - if they could shrink me and put me through a little hell, would they? I liked to imagine them playfully putting me through 'a day in their shoes', but no matter what kind of condition their stomping foot put me in, it was always 'just part of the prank', and they would slowly start incorporating more and more cruelty, with the excuse that it was 'all in fun'. Sometimes they would let me go, but usually my life became little more that a blur of giant, crushing smelly feet, with my friends' pretty faces occasionally laughing down at me.

So, as you can see, I like GTS but only from the shrunken perspective, and I like imagining being under their feet. I don't like the thought of being crushed to death, but rather mashed until I have no hope of moving again, and have to endure the feet and face of the pretty woman or girl until she's satisfied (which often never happens).

As for sites, I like Crushfeet and E-feet, along with Feetsees.

1111111111111.content:
Hello. Hopefully most of you should know who I am - if not, feel free to look at my portfolio and add to one of my interactives.

Now that the obligatory plug is out of the way, I'll thank whoever it was that gave me the gift of a paid account recently - I don't know who you are, but I am very grateful, and feel like I'm not yet using it to its full potential. I fully intend to get down to writing some self-contained non-interactives for this site at some point, but inspiration is the only thing I lack now. Again, all y'all that read this should feel free to e-mail me suggestions or recommendations to get the ol' wheel rolling.

Anyway, to the matter in hand. I can't say for certain where this macrophilia thing first came from for me. I'm a child of the eighties, so there were a lot of weird cartoons out there, influencing my poor little mind. Perhaps giant transforming robots contributed in some way? We'll never truly know. The only thing that may partially be responsible that I could think of was the fact that I saw 'Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger' at an early age. You know the one; it starred Taryn Power's feet.

Then, of course, is the fact that the Ted Danson version of Gulliver's Travels hit tv screens when I was at a very... delicate stage of my puberty. That may have been the point where I realised that there was no turning back, that I was in on the giantess ride for the long haul.

What particulars are there that I find really good? Unlike most people, I find no aspect of crush or vore especially exciting; at the end of the day that's death, and I find it hard to get turned-on by that. Perhaps it's the voyeurism aspect that appeals, but with the risk that should the woman you're observing discover you, she has the power to utterly end you if she should so wish. It's the potential for destruction that a giantess holds, the comparison in strength between her and things around her, that does more for me than gratuitous scenes of devastation and sex.

Of course, I still enjoy a good demonstration of unbridled giantess power as much as the next person, but my first preference would be for unaware shrinking. Often I find myself looking at women in the street and imagining what it would be like to be tiny in their presence right at that moment, and many of them find their way into the entries I add to stories here on writing.com.

Feet play a big part in my stories sometimes, but that's more through a logical approach than anything else; above all, I think that stories here should make sense, with logical progression of events. A shrunken guy is gonna meet feet first, and when a woman discovers a tiny man her first instinct is not to eat him or make him worship her peds. That level of absurdity breaks the illusion of reality that stories can conjure, and I don't like that one bit.

Yes, I like feet, I think I mentioned, but I would put my favourite part of the female body down as hands. They just seem more intelligent and full of potential than feet, while still leaving plenty of room for size comparisons in shrinking stories.

I can't really recommend any sites that haven't been already, but I can advise you to go out and find the first few issues of volume 3 of Wonder Woman, as well as issue 19 of Blue Beetle - plenty of fun with Giganta in those issues. And I can't recommend Irredeemable Ant Man highly enough - the man gets a shrinking suit and actually does the logical thing of going off to see women in the shower. Never thought I'd see that in a Marvel comic book...

Yes, I'm a bit of a geek, in case you hadn't already realised. I'm just not sure over whether I should be more embarassed about that or this macrophilia thing...

"So, just go whenever?"

Alright, my web handle is somedude248. You'd have to torture me to find out my real name. And I am...a macrophile. I'm also a budding writer who likes to use macro stories as a warm-up and diversion from writing more serious works, and in my spare time, a submission wrestler and a bit of a history buff. The two hobbies fit together. After all, Abraham Lincoln was a champion catch wrestler in his day.

And if you can tell, I also tend to ramble a bit.

Anyway, how did I get into this odd, odd community/fetish/interest? Well, it was lingering the back of my mind ever since I was a child. I always liked the idea of a girl that could kick butt, but not be evil. Most of the time, you look in fiction, and any female with strength is automatically a villain. Then, with the internet and file sharing exploding, anime became easy to acquire. Video games featuring tough, cute women came out. It all got put to the side, ready to interact with the one idea that was still lingering in the back of my mind, mixing into a stew of oddity.

Then one day, on a whim, I ended up typing in "giant women" in a random search engine. One thing led to another and led to another and all these pent up ideas took life.

It's not an annihilation fantasy for me. I take no pleasure in being weak, being hurt, or in general being depowered, which is why shrink has next to no appeal for me outside of writing a plot. I prefer the idea of the woman growing larger, more powerful and more free. And because of that meandering mix in my brain, I have a decisive preference for anime and fictitious females over celebrities and the like.

Anyways, I'm done. I don't want to go too long.

111111111111111111.content:
Well this is Derek Metaltron from ye old England and I too am of the Giantess loving type.

First I'm gonna admit some home truths. I am not into the violent giantess which the large majority of stories and interactives go for. I don't particularly find getting killed by a rather OTT giantess in any means erotic. That's not to say that I wouldn't read a little of that stuff if it was well written, but that can often not be the case. I do of course respect any one who feels otherwise - it's your version of macrophilia, this is mine.

So as you can guess I am more of a gentle and playful giantess lover, my favourite areas being unaware giantesses, soft vore and that wonderful and sadly relatively unknown word called 'Endosomaphila', which basically means a person who enjoys the idea of being inside another living thing, though not always the digestive system - in short then, body exploration. When I was little and even before understanding sex I liked the idea of shrinking down and going inside people's bodies and exploring them, with or without their awareness - both ways suited me. I would of course point out that were I to have the opportunity to shrink down I would be careful to ensure two things - that I am able to regain my size whenever I want, and that it would be impossible for anything to harm me (a stray foot, stomach acids, nasty falls and a million other deaths). Call me boring if you want but I reckon it pays to be prepared.

Oh and I'm not a foot person. Kind of ironic since my mum is a chiropodist, but feet just don't appeal to me, except the seems to climbing up a person body (which does appeal). And squishing is definitely out.

My ideal giantess would be a girlfriend who is completely ok to the idea of me changing size and checking her out both in and out.

One thing which worries me as a Gentle Giantess fan is that there seems amongst the interactives and stories to be one way or another when it comes to the violent/gentle giantess divide. The violent type is more pronounced and is seen in many a situation which usually uninterests me, yet I find an appeal to the sexual and body related area these stories provide, if not the violent end the males often see. In contrast it's great to see a rising number of gentle interactives with gentle and playful giantesses and even a forum on the site, but virtually all of these see a lower age rating which prevents any juicy stuff from appearing on the interactive. It is my long-term intention then to try and put an end to this, and I am in the progress of devising a detailed interactive with a focus on gentle giantesses and body exploration, including for the first time a story which sees you as ruler of a land of giants and not having them rule over you. Entitled 'King of the Giantesses', the interactive should see an aim to allow gentle fans who still like the idea of doing the dirty stuff hopefully have the best of both worlds when I eventually release it in its skeletonal form. So to sum up if anyone finds my idea interesting give me a buzz and let me know if there would be anything you'd like to see - I am hoping to give the public a chance to put forward their suggestions within the boundaries set and allow for their desires to be seen, and there's a good chance of a forum if there's enough interest.

Now, as far as my favourite places, I'm going to add some fav stories of mine on Giantess World which fit into my interests nicely, as well as some interactives on this site itself which I find original or well done. Hope you might find something you like in these as well. :)

Giantess World Stories

Arousing Angie - One shot story with a playful giantess and some great body exploration stuff. - http://www.giantessworld.net/viewstory.p...

Back In Her Hands - I don't confess to be a huge Legend of Zelda fan but this long but amazing story blew me away. It's completely PG but it completely captures the idea of a gentle Giantess and her would-be boyfriend perfectly AND carries on the story of the N64 games too! As far back as I can remember I have had a fascination with being tiny or encountering a gigantic creature, many of these fantasies centered around being inside of the mouth and deeper. I must admit sometimes I am a little weirded out as to why I have this strange fetish, but then I know that I was just born this way. My search for content that would fulfill my fascination began with just google searches for "swallowed by whale" "inside giant mouth" and things of that nature. Then one day (admittedly at a younger age than you should be viewing these sites) I stumbled upon a series of personal websites of artists who made photoshopped pictures of giant women. It wasn't long after that I found my first vore picture. I kept on searching thinking that I would eventually see it all and my fascination would be quenched. Over the years it became apparent that it was a little more than a fascination. I lurked the forums occasionally for a long time. Eventually I made my first account (donmon) on writing.com. I read the stories and eventually worked up the courage to add some of my own chapters. I tried endlessly to become a good artist but drawing never really stuck. As I wrote I taught myself more and more, learning from novels and other authors on these sites, how to write a good work of fiction. I feel that without these stories I would have never discovered my ability to write, and possibly would not have ended up majoring in what I did. I do not hold myself too high as a fiction writer, which is probably why my Rob the Voraphile stories seem to stand out from the rest.

In a way these stories are my ultimate fantasy put down on paper. And they are written in the first person, unlike pretty much all of my work which is mostly 3rd person, so I can really get into the character that is pretty much based off myself.

I guess I'll talk about what I am really into now. First and formost I am a giantess fan. I almost always picture myself in the shoes of the tiny, in fact it used to make me sick to think otherwise(and still does to some extent). Though as I explored the forums and learned of all of the other sub-fantasies contained within this thing we call macrophilia/ voraphilia, I grew more interest in other areas. I have always found the idea of being inside another creature to be exciting, regardless of its sex as long as it was not human. But as in my rob the voraphile stories my biggest interest is that of willing prey, even dominant prey at times. So yeah I guess thats me.

Well ladies and gents, I'm finally writing about this. It's my own little deviation on macro.. Gotta say it's taken me a long time to get here and it's so twisted and frightening that I can't even think about it anymore without feeling waves of fear and at the same time excitement at the thought. It's surreal thinking that I have a desire like this but I figured at some point I've got to come clean about it. Spent tonight looking for a place to start and I really don't know what will happen but here's my story and the plot of my most far out fantasy right now.

A disclaimer - Stop reading if at anytime you feel uneasy. Trust me there are other things that could use your attention. I want you to know as you are reading this that I would never wish this on anyone. I'm writing this just so it's here and while it is my desire, I have no intention of trapping your attention on this one. To me though, it seems like the greatest adventure to take.

In the spirit of honesty, but also keeping discreet I think it is possible to do this if you were in the right state of mind...and I want to say that there are ways to get there.

I try to make it real. As much as I can, I've looked at macro as something more than just a psychological phenomenon. I actually try to see what the physicality of it might be like and after much thought and after looking at as much as I can, here I am. It's brutal. It's not at all like what the stories say it's like. In this world, if it happened to you, there's no deus ex machina to save your ass, it's just you. Because being tiny, especially if you were ant sized, which is what I fantasize about sometimes, is perfect aloneness. There is never a scenario where I'm alone alone, there's always a gigantic woman in front of me. She has been every type of woman I can think of, in every age and shape. Most of the time though, I'm attracted to the mother figure, sometimes an actual mother, never my own though there have been times where I've thought about it, but for the most part, just a beautiful woman who is a mother. Sometimes, she's unaware of me, other times and particularly when I'm feeling really deep into it, she is aware. What she does is generally the same in all situations.

But when you think about it, pregnant women have cravings. And she would seek to nourish herself in whatever way if the situation called for it. I think about that a lot and wonder, if I was ant sized, would a hungry pregnant woman even notice me in her breakfast. I would literally be nothing to her except fuel for her day.

And that's a pretty normal thought for most voreaphiles. But really think about what I just said. Think about how it would look, if you were in this woman's breakfast, small as an ant. And here's the reality of it. It happens all the time. They eat tiny creatures all the time without realising it. Heck even when they're sleeping they end up devouring tiny beings that wander too close to them. It occurs to me that most of the writers here have been taking perhaps too specifically about aspects of macrophilia. I'm not gonna complain, but it's worth a mention that the last guy was fishing for a yes/no answer to "is vore creepy".
I'm not prepared to answer that question any more than I'm prepared to write my magnum opus. It's out of my league as a person to handle.
Here's the short version of what I'm about to say: macro/micro is probably among the most broad fetishes out there. The possibilities in this one fetish alone (not adding any other fetishes in) are greater than a large number of other kinks. We have tons of resources to get our fix, from freakin' movies to roleplay boards and everything in between. Compare that to , say, an incest fetish and you'll immediately see that in terms of diversity and potential, we're among the best fetishes. It's such a diverse kink that GTS image boards have a significantly higher ratio of fetish - specific tags to generic tags than almost any other image board. We've got all the bases covered.
And the reason I bring this up is just to say that I feel lucky that my interests have potential. I know I would hate writing the same thing over and over and over until I gave up. I mean, that's most of the reason I don't write more chapters; I feel like I have to branch out and try new things as a writer, and create a story without rewriting anything.

I prefer female normal size, so the tiny doesn't have to share,

I prefer human characters, which is probably surprising, considering all the additions I've made to this site. I just like my macros to have character, and so long as that qualifier is met, I'm not picky.

This site is what first got me majorly invested in the fetish, though it's not where it started, so thanks for that, I guess.
Other than that, I've got nothin '.
I'm a nerdy writer. You shouldn't have expected much.

12.content:
You got back home only two minutes ago and already you're beginning to have doubts about what you'd just done. The paper add for this MA thing had sounded too good to be true, especially with the low price tag. You couldn't have filled your gas tank up with the amount this cost you. Admittedly gas is getting more expensive, but still this is cheap compared to what you would have expected. Looking at the thing in your hand you can only guess that it cost twice what you're paying for this.

The Tachyon Tag, as the lady at the desk had called it, looked like a kind of high tech injector you'd expect to see on a scifi show. Star Trek or Wars or something like that. Its basic shape was that of a gun, with a needle at one end, and all over it was blinking lights and readouts, which you couldn't even begin to make sense of, and you wondered if the maker had just put them on for show. It was entirely possible that the device was simpler than the thing in your hand seemed, and that flashing lights and stuff were just bells and whistles added on for the viewing pleasure of the customer.

You still couldn't believe someone had a service like this. It was just so weird. Yet you had to admit the moment your eyes found that article in the paper you were hooked. You wanted to see what it was like at antsize, and now, a few hours later, you were sitting in your home, waiting for the companion to show up and make those pictures in the catalog a reality in your home. Picking up the catalog you flipped through it to the girl you picked. The catalog had a picture of each companion doing something associated with their particular field, with an insert on the side that was supposedly what they were saying as they did it.

You can choose either

Tiffany, a good looking blonde in a shirt that barely covered her nipples let alone her breasts. Skinny, but not stick figure, just the kind of skinny that solicits wolf whistles on the streets. Her picture had her eating what looked like a sandwich, what kind you couldn't tell, while looking at the camera. Her insert read:
"I need a little variety in my diet. You might do nicely."

Samantha, an odd looking girl, but mostly because you really couldn't she her because the POV of the camera was pointing up off the floor, with the sole of her shoe taking up most of the picture. Her mode of dress was black, and her eyes were screaming in delight as she brought her foot closer, supposedly crushing the poor cameraman. Her insert read:
"I like bugs. The way their bodies sort of turn to liquid under my heel. I wonder what you'd turn into?"

Tabitha, an interesting looking woman, though the picture was actually not about her. Instead it was about the various animals around her. From cats, to dogs, to small mammals and reptiles, all the way up to a komodo dragon. According to the info on the page she was the animal trainer, and thus if you picked an animal as your companion you met her too. Her insert read:
"My babies are just dying to make your acquaintance. Starving for your attention."

Besides the female section of the catalog, which according to the front cover is the men's MA list of companions, is two section of other kinds of companions. The first is a collection of male companions, most of which are probably comparable to the females in attractiveness, and from the photos they are probably just as skilled at their art.

The other section is a surprise to you, and it makes you think that this is all some kind of hoax, as the people listed in it are not human. Well, really they look human, but certain features seem to have been cut and pasted from animals. The cover art for the section, and apparently their top companion is named Molly, and she looks like a perfectly normal wolf, if you discount the fact that she's standing up and her fore paws look like human hands, though you can still see claws on the end. It appears they offer male companions in that section as well, and according to the title the companions within are called Anthromorpic Humanoids, or Anthros for short.

You stare at her picture for a while longer, wondering if this was a real photo of her work and if there was a guy really trapped in that sandwich as she ate it. After a few minutes pass you get bored just staring at the picture and take a look around the room. The clock on your VCR is still flashing twelve. You know how to set it, you just don't bother cause the thing doesn't record right. Looking above that you stare at your real clock and see that you've been home for over an hour. According to the ad she would arrive anywhere from now to tomorrow at around the same time.

The minutes tick away on the clock, and slowly you find that despite the adrenalin still pumping in your body you can't stay awake. After a time the darkness overtakes you, and you wonder just before you fall into deep sleep if this is all just a dream and you'll wake up tomorrow laughing at yourself for your own foolishness before going to work. The images that you experience while your asleep can't really be called a dream, but most involve you falling into the photo of Tiffany, landing inside her sandwich, and holding on for the ride.

A sharp slam awakens you from the dream, if you could call it that, and you jump up, looking for whatever had made the sound. After a few seconds you realize it was a car door, and stepping up to the window you see a woman outlined in your porchlight, and not just any woman either. It's the girl from the photo, Tiffany. She's even wearing that strip of cloth for a shirt/bra, despite the fact that its just a little past midnight now.

Looking at the clock in a double take you start. You'd been asleep for almost two hours, yet you felt like you'd been sleeping for hours, unfortunately it felt like that because of the pain in your back, which at first you were willing to caulk up to the sofa which you'd bought second hand, but looking back at where you'd been laying you see something that makes your heart drop. It's that Tag thing they gave you at the MA office, you must have rolled onto it in your sleep.

You panic for a moment and sprint to the sofa with a speed you wouldn't have thought yourself capable of considering the fact that you'd just woken up, but then you really didn't want to have to pay the money to replace the device. Looking over it you also realize that you'd never used it on yourself, which you were supposed to do when you got home. Looking at the smashed dials and lights you wonder if its still works, and so with a sigh you test it. The injector bites into your neck and you pull the trigger.

“Hello Mr Marshall, my name is Tiffany from Macrophiles Anonymous. I believe you’re expecting me,” says the lady at the door. In the catalogue, she was wearing a skimpy shirt that barely covered her nipples but tonight she is wearing a white pinstriped tailored business suit and a matching mini skirt. You're still not completely sure that this isn't one of those damned able hidden camera programs where the person is fooled into thinking all this stuff is going to happen to them, and then at the last instant you find out that you've been completely humiliated on national if not international Television, yet are unable to sue for the emotional duress due to some little bit of the show's contract that allows it to do this to people because they signed another contract on the show, like the one you signed at the MA office. Shaking your head to clear your thoughts you run to the door and open it slowly. The girl behind it is the exact same one you saw walking up the drive, and you're relived that you can't see any obvious cameras or vans. The woman, for the most part, looks to be enjoying herself. As you look her up and down she does the same to you, and after a moment nods in satisfaction. Whatever she had been visually testing you for you had obviously passed.

"Hello Mr. Marshall. I think you know that my name is Tiffany, and I'm one of the companions at Macrophiles Anonymous. I hear you signed up for our service," she says, and you stand stark still staring at her for a moment before opening the door wide and motioning your hand for her to come in.

"That I did Tiffany. And you can call me Steve if I can call you Tiffany," you say as you lead her into your living room. The two of you take a seat side by side on your sofa and you stare at her some more as she pulls off a hip pack you had failed to notice before that contains several objects, including what looks like clothes to fit a very small person, and some black dots that might be clothes too, but are so small you can't really tell.

"Ok Steve, here's how this works. I have with me a bottle of the miniaturization agent and the antidote. When you're ready I'll give you the agent, which has been marked with a yellow stripe. If you want to be about half an inch tall, drink it only to the yellow stripe, and if you want to be about a 16th of an inch, then just chug the whole thing. Now let's see here," she mumbles to herself as she continues to rummage through he bag.

"Here we go," she says triumphantly as she brings out what looks like an old fashioned walkie talkie, handing it to you a moment later.

"What is this?" you ask, poking the thing.

"That is the communicator. I use it to stay in touch with you. See it has two littler walkie talkies on the side, one for the half inch high, the other for the 16th of an inch. You'll carry one with you so that you can tell me of any problems that occur," she told you, continuing to go through the pack.

"Have any problems ever occurred for you doing this?" you ask her a little uneasily as you put the communications device on the coffee table with the rest of the stuff.

"Out of thirty eight times I've done this, only once have I had a problem," she told you, pulling out a beaker of some brownish liquid and handing it to you. You don't have to be told that this is the shrinking agent, it has a yellow stripe about halfway down the beaker.

"What!?" you shout in both disgust and alarm.

"Well he didn't take his Tag,, which meant that he was the only one I can remember, so even though he was like the tenth time I'd been called to do it, he's the only one I remember. That's kind of how they came up with the name. If everything goes right then only the receptionist at the office knows who you are, and she sees so many people a day she probably wouldn't remember if you were black, white, or purple after an hour," she tells you, in a serious tone.

"Now then, are you going to drink the potion or do you want me to leave?" she asks, and you both stare at the beaker in your hand. 121212.title: Location?

1212122.content:
Looking down at you as she listen she nods in approval at your choice, and then does something you hadn't expected. She reaches into the hip pack of hers and brings out another odd looking thing. This time it resembles a needle, and after a cursory inspection you discover that it is a needle, kind of like the one from Fantastic Voyage by Issac Asimov, or Inner Space with Martin Short, either one works as an analogy. Tiffany does her own inspection of the needle, and after a few taps on it with her finger turns towards you.

"HOLD ON TO YOUR SHORTS," she says, and then presses a button on the back of the needle. Instantly a suction force begins to draw you up into the needle and soon you are literally floating inside its depths, looking out at the world through the glass which twists the images. You try to reach out to touch the wall but find yourself held firmly in the center of the tube through some unknown force. Looking around you jump back in surprise as you see Tiffany's humongous eye looking at you through the glass. The walkie talkie in your hand clicks and you hear her through voice through it, yet not through the glass, surprising considering you are so close to her lips.

"You okay in there little man?" she asks, sounding slightly concerned, pressing the button on your own walkie talkie you respond.

"Well yeah. But what is this? And why can't I hear you anymore?" you ask her.

"Well I don't actually know what it is, it's just what the office gave me to carry you around in safely. I guess it's soundproof too," she tells you through the radio, staring at you through the glass tube.

"So where to now. I mean there are plenty of locations outside your home, a whole world full of them, so how about we narrow down the choices, huh?" she asks you, and you think for a moment on where you could go. The most obvious classification of locations is public or private at this point. So which one?
1212122.title: Venue choices

choices: Try and think of something else
12121221.content:
"You know it might be interesting to do this somewhere in public. I mean it's not like people are gonna see me, right?" you tell her, and through the needle you can see her consider this for a moment before your walkie talkie clicks again.

"Well I guess so. Still where exactly? I mean we could probably do this at any number of places without getting noticed, but I still need an exact location. Preferably something close cause gas costs a lot these days and my car seems to burn through it like paper," she says, forcing you to consider again. She's right public is a big place, and you really could have her eat you just about anywhere. A restaurant seems the most obvious choice for something like this, but maybe you can think of something better?
12121221.title: A little more specific

choices: "How about something a bit more expensive?"
121212211.content:
Ah what the hell. A restaurant seems like as good a place as any to get yourself eaten. Pushing the button on your walkie talkie you tell her so, and you can feel as the needle moves up and down as she nods in agreement.

"So where too exactly? I know a fast food burger joint down the block, or we can try something slower and more elaborate," she says, and you think for a moment. You seem to remember that a new restaurant opened a few days ago down town, but you have never really been one to eat at such a place. Looking at Tiffany you make your decision and push the button again. You tell her...
121212211.title: A lot more specific

choices: "What the hell did you do that for?!"
"Just a few bumps and bruises, nothing serious"
1212122111.content:
"Let's go to the burger place. It's not as fancy, but it's still at least one step up from fast food," you tell her. You look at her through the needle, trying to gauge her reaction, but you find nothing before the needle you are in is moved with a speed that you find nauseating, and suddenly you're in darkness. You quickly realize that Tiffany has pocketed the needle, with you inside, and that your adventure is truly about to begin.

The ride is boring to say the least you can see the occasional flashes of light through her pocket, but for the most part the whole scene before you is dark. You can't even feel the bumps and jostles as she moves about because the needle keeps you ever in its center, away from harm. You still have no idea how it does that, but considering the force that those bumps and jostles consist of your glad for it, after all without it you would be little more than a stain.

It doesn't take long for the lights outside to stop whizzing by, and you think that you're there. The burger joint at the end of your block. As you told Tiffany its is a step up from the usual fast food, though not really by that much. Really the place is just a grill with a building around it, though you've always found the food at least of halfway decent quality. Normally a local place like this would close down sometime well before midnight, but with the latest craze of late night restaurants the manager decided he should join in, and now the place was open twenty-four hours, six days a week, excluding only Mondays, which the manager says are bad luck.

Without any real warning at all you are blinded as Tiffany withdraws the needle from her pocket and holds it before her looking at you. You hold your walkie talkie close by expecting another talk, but instead you find a suction force begin to pull at you body, and you watch as the needle's exit rushes towards you. Tiffany is ejecting you from the needle! With a scream you fall through the silver slide into the open air, and see nothing but a long drop below.

That drop suddenly becomes shorter as Tiffany's hand seems to appear out of nowhere, catching you softly, at least when compared to the floor. You slowly rise from your fall, feeling aches in your shoulder and leg, but not big ones, and with an amazing speed you find yourself feeling better than you would have thought possible after such a drop. Apparently there are some advantages to being a sixteenth of an inch tall. Looking up you pull your walkie talkie closer but before you can say anything Tiffany's voice booms at you.

"ARE YOU OKAY?" she asks, and you feel an intense desire to say no, but instead push the button and tell her...
1212122111.title: Smooth ride, rough landing

12121221112.content:
"GOOD. I'M SORRY ABOUT THAT BUT I JUST THOUGHT WALKING IN THERE WITH A SYRINGE WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA," she tells you, and thinking about it a moment you are forced to agree. Looking around you see you are in her two door little car still, right outside the burger joint. She then does something odd. She takes a piece of her walkie talkie off and sticks it in her ear. You realize that it would probably look weird to carry one inside and so make no comment to her about it.

"Well since we're here let's go in and have a peek at what's on the menu," you tell her instead, in as sly a voice as you can manage. She smiles down at you, and then forms her hand into a fist, keeping you safely inside it. It isn't quite as bad as you imagined, but your pretty sure Disney would never want to put in a ride called, in the giant's hand. Six Flags might though. You'll have to remember that and suggest it to someone.

Upon entering the burger joint you are assaulted by the tingling of the bells hung on the door, as well as a bit of music playing from an old fashioned jukebox in the back. The air smells heavily of burned meat and broken dreams, as most of the patrons are sipping away at their drinks. Tiffany, you in hand walks up to the register and she sets her fist so that you can look around. The place is actually pretty busy considering the hour, and not one of them appears to be a trucker. Most appear to be local cheerleaders, probably out for a night on the town after the big game that was sometime tonight.

"CAN I PLEASE ASK YOU TO TAKE A SEAT MISS? THE GRILL IS ON THE FRITZ RIGHT NOW, BUT BILL ASSURES ME HE CAN HAVE IT UP AND RUNNING IN A MINUTE OR TWO, SO IF YOU'LL JUST WAIT," says a new voice, one that is much younger than you would expect. Looking at where the voice came from you are shocked to see that it belongs to a girl about the same age as the cheerleaders, and at least twice as hot. You wonder for a moment what she's doing in a dump like this, and then remember that this place is family owned and operated, she's probably the owner's daughter. Tiffany seems to droop a little at this news, but then smiles at the girl.

"SURE, I DON'T MIND," she tells her, and then walks to one of the empty tables to wait. In her fist you find that the clothes that fit perfectly a moment before are beginning to feel a little tight in the pants, and looking around its not hard to imagine why. After a moment you realize that you find it really tempting to ask Tiffany to try and put you on the counter, so that you can crawl inside a burger at random, that way the person eating it wouldn't even know you're there, which for some odd reason increases the pressure in your pants. Do you ask her to put you on the counter?
12121221112.title: Another brilliant scheme

121212211121.content:
Feeling a little embarrassed you pull out your walkie talkie and consider how to ask Tiffany to place you in a position where she might not be the one to eat you, but after a second you remember that she told you she wouldn't remember anyway, and that means it really doesn't matter that much. Looking around you also decide to tell her to go into the bathroom before she starts talking with you, that way you can talk in peace, relatively speaking.

"Hey Tiffany. I have something I want to ask you. Can we go to the bathroom so we can talk?" you say, and then look up at her through the gaps between her fingers. Tiffany takes a nervous look around before nodding and rising from her chair. You find the bathroom disturbingly close to the kitchen, but enter anyway to find that it is immaculate. Not a single speck of dirt anywhere. Obviously these people take pride in their place of business.

"OKAY STEVE, WHAT IS IT YOU WANT TO ASK ME?" she says, opening her fist so that she stares at you on her flat palm. Taking in the sight you full begin to comprehend just how small you are, as her palm is a pink plain stretching in all directions. Shaking off that thought you look up at her face as you push the button on your walkie talkie.

"I don't know if this is gonna make this sound kinkier than it already is, but can I ask you to put me on the counter of the kitchen window?" you ask.
121212211121.title: Asking a favor

choices: It falls over the edge, to shatter into a million even smaller pieces
It stops just before the fall, allowing you to retrieve it
1212122111212.content:
"WHAT? WHY?" she replies. Her tone is not angry like you expected, but instead very curious.

"Well I don't know why, but it just makes this sound more fun if the person who's going to eat me doesn't know it. I don't suppose you can understand that?" you say to her through the walkie talkie.

"WELL NOT REALLY STEVE, BUT YOU ARE THE CUSTOMER. I MAY HAVE A BETTER IDEA THOUGH. THAT COUNTER HAS A LOW OVERHANG ABOVE IT. HOW ABOUT I PUT YOU THERE AND THEN YOU CAN SLIDE OFF INTO A BURGER AS IT PASSES UNDER THAT?" she says, and you could kick yourself for not thinking of that yourself.

"Tiffany, that sounds perfect. You know I'm going to have to recommend you to my friends. Well that is if I ever tell anyone about this," you say the last line with the button up, meaning she can't her you. The part about recommending her to your friends seems to have her bursting at the seams though, and she smiles more broadly then you though possible.

"NOT A PROBLEM STEVE," she tells you, and then forms her hand into a fist again. As the two of you step out of the bathroom you are surprised to find the girl from the counter going between the five tables of cheerleaders, apparently taking orders. Obviously The grill is working again. Tiffany casually strolls by the window to the kitchen where the plates will pass, and with an equally casual mannerism she waves her fist over the overhang atop it, and opens it in the same motion, so that you drop onto the gray metal surface.

The landing is much rougher than you expected, and as you tumble head over heels on the overhang you feel your own hands open up, and your grip on your walkie talkie loosens. Suddenly it breaks completely and you watch the device slide over the smooth metal, towards the precipice. Do you lose the only communication between you and Tiffany?
1212122111212.title: Another rough landing

choices: Focus your thoughts and try to remember
12121221112121.content:
In a panic you rush after the small device, desperate not to lose your only link to Tiffany. Sadly you misjudge your speed, and with a single slip you fall onto your back, forced to watch as your foot flies out and smacks the device, sending it over the edge of the overhang. Your heart beating faster than you could believe you lean over the edge, and watch in horror as the handheld walkie talkie plummets to the ground below.

Your kick, unfortunately, gave the small device enough momentum to sail clear off the edge of the counter, and then you watch as it shatters into millions of tiny pieces. Looking down at the ruin, you can only gaze in stupefied horror at the remains of your only line of communication with the normal sized world. Now your stuck at one-sixteenth of an inch tall, standing atop the over hand in a burger place, with no way to become normal size.

Then you remember that you never intended on living through this. After all how many people can live through being eaten by another creature, especially a normal sized human being after being reduced to less than ant size. Death was what you were going for with this. All this really did was make it so you had to do it now. Still it feels like your forgetting something. Something important. Something to do with another device that MA gave you. Looking down at the rubble of the communicator you wonder what it was.
12121221112121.title: A faint memory

choices: The one at the edge of the counter
121212211121211.content:
Staring off the edge of the overhang, down at the pieces of the now trashed walkie talkie you try and remember what it was that happened with another device MA gave you. What devices did they give you anyway? All you can remember was that catalog with the companions. Then there was the potion that made you small, the needle Tiffany carried you in, the antidote to the shrinking formula, which Tiffany should still have on her, and last but now least, the walkie talkie. There was something else though. Something to do with a kids game. Tag?

Then it hits you like a freight train. The Tachyon Tag which was your only real hope at living through this experience. When you'd used it after sort of rolling over on top of it, it had smoked something fierce, and you never did ask Tiffany if that was what it was supposed to do. The one guy she remembered having been a companion for had forgotten to inject himself, or so she says, but what if he had just done something to it. Like drop it, or crush it?

For a moment your breathe stops in your throat as you realize that it is very likely you broke the Tag, and now you had to live through this and get the antidote. Of course considering your smaller than a bug, that's not going to be easy. After a second you realize that your breathe is now coming in deep ragged gasps. Your beginning to hyperventilate. You have to calm down. After all Tiffany should have the antidote, all you have to do is get her attention, which should still be possible even though the walkie talkie is broken.

Snapping yourself out of you panic you look over at Tiffany and find she's staring at you, or at least at the overhang. For a second your hope swells as you begin to think she saw the walkie talkie fall, but then she just smiles in your direction as the young girl walks up to her, that pad in hand, ready to take her order.

"WHAT'LL YA HAVE?" she asks Tiffany, in an odd southern accent, obviously fake. Tiffany looks over at you again for an instant and then turns to the board where they list the kinds of burgers they serve.

"UM I DON'T KNOW. WHAT ARE THE GIRL SCOUTS HAVING?" she asks the girl, gesturing over at the cheerleaders.

"ALL OF THEM JUST GOT CLASSIC BURGERS. IF YOU WANT TO BE DIFFERENT I SUGGEST A CHEESEBURGER. THAT'LL ALSO GET BILL TO MAKE YOUR'S A BIT SOONER TOO," she tells Tiffany, who looks over at you again. She stares at you, and you realize she's offering you her stomach.. Turning back to the girl she says, "THAT'LL BE JUST FINE"

"OK I'LL TELL BILL AND YOU SHOULD HAVE YOUR FOOD IN A FEW MINUTES," she tells Tiffany, and then writes on her little pad before walking off into the kitchen. You sigh in relief, and for the first time in minutes your breathing is at least halfway normal. You don't have to worry now about getting served to someone else. All you have to do is jump on to the cheeseburger, and then you'll end up in front of Tiffany.

After that she can give you the antidote and you two can go to the MA office and get another Tag. You spend the next few minutes looking around and feel that same tightness in your pants return as you watch some of the cheerleaders snack on fries that must have been given to tide them over until their burgers are ready. Staring at them you remember why you wanted to do this in the first place, and curse your bad luck for forcing you to delay the moment by causing you to break that Tag thing.

Just as you find yourself truly beginning to contemplate forgetting about the Tag and diving for one of their burgers anyway, you hear several dings of a bell that force you to cover your ears in pain. Below you, you can hear the grinding sound as some plates are pushed through the window, into exactly the position you can jump on them. Running to the edge you frantically begin to search for a burger with cheese, a search made easier because the top buns are laid to the side of each burger, along with lettuce, tomato, onions, pickles, and packets of mayo, ketchup, and mustard.

Looking down you find something that makes your heart drop again. There are two cheeseburgers among the mess of plates, neither looking any different from the others. One of them is going to Tiffany, the other to someone else, and you're gonna have to pick one fast, as the lady who took the orders is walking up quickly. Do you jump for the one at the front of the line of burgers, closer to the edge of the counter, or the one right under the overhang?
121212211121211.title: Panic, calm, then a choice

choices: Yes, looking down right at you her frown turns into a smile
No, her sigh only deepens as she begins to eat
1212122111212111.content:
It looks to be a bit farther out, but the way the universe has been treating you lately the long shots seem like the most likely ones. Stepping back a ways you decide it best to take a running leap, as you don't think it'll be easy to reach the cheeseburger because it's so far out. Steeling yourself, and doing a little prayer, you run at the edge, putting all your strength behind the momentous leap, that carries you far. In front of you passes the waitress' shirt as you plummet to the ground, and you think for a moment that she might see you, but then with a wet plop you land in the gooey cheese.

You made it to the cheeseburger now all you have to do is hope it is served to Tiffany. Swimming around in the mess of cheese you try and stand up, finding that you are just tall enough to touch the burger while your head is above the cheese. A stray thought has you wondering if anyone's ever drowned in melted cheese before, but the heat of the cheese, and the pain it causes your skin pulls you away from inward thoughts, forcing you to stay within the outside world.

After a time you find that the cheese doesn't hurt as much as you thought it did, that it was really like water, you just had to get used to it. With a suddenness that blinds you the world falls dark, and looking up you see the waitress high above looking right at you.

"Yes, down here! Help!" you shout up at her, waving your arms, or at least trying to. The cheese, though melted to the point of almost liquid, is still very sticky, and you find it pulls you arm back into it every time you try to raise it.

The girl, who's name happens to be Andrea, didn't see you anyway, and was looking down only because she was supposed to have met a man from a strange ad in a magazine here tonight. He hadn't come yet though, and she was beginning to doubt he would.

"AH WELL. IT WAS PROBABLY SOME KIND OF JOKE ANYWAY," she says under her breath, picking up the plate your on and lifting it into the air. The jolt of the rise sends you face first into the cheese, and you have to fight to get back to the surface, holding you breath as well as you could to avoid getting cheese in your lungs. At last you break the surface again and stare at the waitress. Looking at her now from close up you see she's actually closer to your age than the cheerleaders, not that, that changes anything.

"No it's not, I'm really down here!" you shout at her, realizing as you do that she was lost in her own thoughts, and that comment was not meant for you. Still you find your situation is worsened now as the cheese is all around you. Like some kind of yellow gooey cloak. To those high above you are just going to be a small bump on a yellow plain. You just have to hope for the best as you try to pull yourself out of the gunk as it sways gently with her stride.

With a monestrous struggle you at last get your left arm free, just in time to fall face first into the cheese again as the plate is dropped onto the table with the force of a bulldozer. To be fair it was probably quite a gently drop, but to someone your size it feels like a thousand foot plummet off a mountain, and you are submerged once again within the yellow goo. Once again you are forced to hold your breath as you swim through the ever cooling, and thus hardening cheese.

Touching the bottom, which happens to the burger itself, you push up, and again find yourself mired in the ooze. Still things aren't all terrible. After you pull your neck free you can turn your gaze skyward, and you find that you did indeed guess right. You are right in front of Tiffany, who is gazing longingly in another direction. Probably at the cheerleaders, to whom she thinks you have just been served. Panic and adrenalin fuel you muscles as you try and rip free of the cheese on her burger. With a ripping sound you right arm comes free and you begin waving it like a maniac.

"Tiffany! Down here! Look down here!" you shout up at her, you throat beginning to feel raw from the effort. You really wish you hadn't dropped that communicator thing. Even if you get out of this now you're not gonna be able to talk for weeks. You continue to wave your arm and shout as Tiffany sighs and turns away as the sound of tearing meat and grinding teeth can be heard from far away. The cheerleaders had started eating, so she turned back to her own meal. She was now looking right at the cheeseburger, but you're so small, does she notice you?
1212122111212111.title: Right or wrong, this isn't going to be easy

choices: Sanity is so five minutes ago, let's have some fun
Listen to it, survival is more important than a moment of pleasure
12121221112121111.content:
"Tiffany!!!" you scream as loud as your lungs can manage. Looking up at her face you see her eyebrow raise in wonder, as she looks around, and then, understanding dawning in her eyes, she looks straight down at you, and her frown, which had only deepened as the cheerleaders started eating, now becomes that same bright smile you'd seen on her face several times already.

"Yes Tiff. I'm down here, now pull me out so we can-Wait! Don't!" you feel your hope deflate like a popped balloon. You hadn't really thought this out too well. Tiffany has no idea about your problems, and so still expects to hear you through the walkie talkie if anything goes wrong. She doesn't think you're on her burger so she can rescue you, she thinks your there so she can eat you, and proves it by picking up a lettuce leaf and dropping it gently on top of you.

The smell of the new green tarp settling atop you is overwhelming, and you also know that it is a death shroud for you. With it over you, there is no way Tiffany can see you, or know that anything is wrong. Soon you hear a plop sound, and you realize she's putting ketchup over top the lettuce, and then suddenly everything around you goes dark as night as the pressure from above increases to heights you hadn't believed possible and then slacks off a bit, letting you breath again.

The feelings, though new to you, are still identifiable, and you know without a doubt that Tiffany had just put on the top bun and then squeezed down. With a sickening, wrenching motion you feel the ground tilt and sway as it moves up, and then you hear a sound you've been hearing for a while, but from much closer. The sound of bread ripping, lettuce tearing, and meat rending as someone bites into a burger. Tiffany has begun her meal, and unfortunately you are her special treat inside it.

You consider screaming your lungs out again, but decide quickly that it would do no good, after all if she couldn't hear you through open air he defiantly won't hear you through all the stuff she put on top of you, even if you are a lot closer to her ears. You soon give up on pulling yourself out of the cheese as well, as it seems to have hardened around you, creating a kind of mold of your body in it, and making it so you can't escape under your own power.

All of these thoughts and plans flit through your mind, only to be dismissed a moment later, not out of panic, or fear of death, after all you're way beyond panic, and fear of death isn't really an issue. Instead you just can't see the use of any of them. You can't run, screaming won't do any good, and Tiffany, the one person who knows your shrunk, is intent on forcing you down her gullet. With no real hope you aren't going to try and fool yourself with false ones, instead you're just going to lay back and hang on for the ride, and hope it's everything you thought it would be. Something worth dying to experience.

With a start you are thrown back into reality by the sound of a gulp, a loud one. It doesn't take a rocket scientist to figure out that it was Tiffany sending her first bite down into her stomach, where you will soon be joining it. The sound of crashing, and the pressure are right on top of you as she bites into her burger again, and for a second you are sure you're going to be bitten in half, but then the pressure disappears, and not a meter away is a white shiny wall in which you can she your reflection, Tiffany's incisor.

Slowly, almost delicately, she pulls the burger away, and you watch in awe as the tendrils of spit get longer, and then without warning break and glisten as they pull back onto her lush lips, with look like they were stolen from the Mona Lisa. Staring at those lips you watch as she opens her mouth, and around the still complete bite of burger you can she her mouth, the luscious, juicy mouth, that you just want to jump into.

Part of you brain that's not totally engrossed in the sight of Tiffany's open mouth and the undulating throat wall at the back, or the tonsils which seem to glisten like silver, or the lips, gums and tongue which all beckon you inside. Where was I? Oh yes, the part of you brain no totally blown away by these images is telling you that it is time to start screaming and waving again, but it is a truly tiny part, and the rest of you is screaming at it to shut up. Do you listen to that tiny piece of sanity, or ignore it.
12121221112121111.title: A little voice of sanity

choices: The Tag still works, and you are safe, maybe
The Tag fails, that was the end
121212211121211111.content:
Ignoring the last bit of your sanity you watch amazement and awe as Tiffany slowly brings her tongue up and starts to lick the piece of burger she'd just bitten off. You stare at her as she slowly, tenderly wipes the cheese and ketchup off the end of the burger you can see, and then, with a skill that the most talented sword swallower couldn't match she flicks her tongue upward, and with her mouth still open so you can watch, she lets the burger slide toward her esophagus and once it hits that lightly quivering back wall it vanishes into the depths. She swallows everything in her mouth with a single, condemning gulp and you stare as her throat expands to accept the huge morsel, and you can swear you hear a splash as it disappears into her chest.

You wonder for a moment if that show was for anyone else as well, but your view consists solely of Tiffany, and you don't even spare a glance at the others. Tonight, and probably every night after this one, you are her's. She smiles a bit, and stares into the burger, not really seeing you, but knowing that you were either in her stomach now, or staring at her from the very edge of the burger, the same edge she was about to send to join the other pieces she'd eaten.

Licking her lips lustfully, getting off any stray pieces of cheese or ketchup she looked down at where you sat, and you found that though harder, the cheese was still bending in certain areas. Staring up at her you are tempted to ask her to hurry up, but decide that she is a professional, and knows her business. She'll take as long as she thinks she needs to, and only then give you the ultimate water flume ride into her nice tight belly.

Lifting you up with a slow, and seeming delicate grace, she brings you to her lips, and you can she the bits of meat, bread, and cheese still stuck inside her mouth. The whole place is like one huge glistening cavern, and looking into its depths you find that you really wish you'd found some larger pants, as these seem to be way to small. As if in a frame by frame you enter her mouth, the area around you going dark as you fly deeper into the cave.

With a jerk the burger stops, and you find that it gives you just enough force to pull yourself out of the cheese, and then fall onto the waiting tongue below. Tiffany starts as she feels a small morsel fall on to her tongue, the taste a strange mixture of meat, hair, and clothes. She knows it's you without a second thought, and sees an opportunity for a bit of fun before she ends her session with you, and then goes back to her apartment for the night.

Meanwhile, inside her mouth, you are thrown into what should be utter darkness, as the teeth come together around both you and burger, yet you find yourself still able to make out the glistening cavern in front of you, and the huge white boulders that mark the entrance to the living cavern. Beneath you the tongue feels like a plush living carpet, dimpling under your small weight, and you find that when you press in on it, the thing seems to vibrate with pleasure.

"Ohhh," moans Tiffany softly, and the sound seems to come from all around you. Without any warning at all, her tongue cups, and you find yourself sliding over its slick, soft surface, towards the center of it, all the while the little red dots, well the normally little red dots that are her taste buds grab at you, taking in every bit of your flavor.
"UHHH," she moans again, this time much louder, and you find your own pleasure at the sensations running through your body to be at least the equal of her's. Everything around you is like a soft, gently swaying chamber of warmth. Tenderly you stroke the ground under you, and she giggles at the tiny tickle on her tongue, sending vibrations through her mouth that are better than anything you had ever felt before in your life.

You stay in the center of her tongue for only a moment as she tips her it again, and you find that you are sliding over it again. With an abrupt crash you slam into one of her lower molars, and feel her tongue raise up, as if to place you on top of it. You find that even that seems like it would be thrill, even if a short one, but then she tilts her tongue again, and you slide all the way across it towards the other side of her mouth.

Again, and again she tips her tongue, with you enjoying every minute of it, but she seems to grow bored with the waiting, and after only a few times you come to rest once again in the center line that runs down her tongue. Behind you the burger still sits, and you wonder what exactly she's going to do next. You don't wonder long though as the tongue beneath your feet becomes something akin to a tidal wave, washing you back towards the pink cavern's rear exit.

You watch as the scene sort of slows down, as if Tiffany is somehow controlling time inside her mouth. Thinking about the Tag you realize that she might just be doing that, but you brush off the thought as you pass between the two huge red boulders that are her tonsils, and then right under the shiny pink drop of flesh that is her uvula. It bobs over you for a moment, like it's waving bye, and then you drop over the precipice at the back of her mouth, and into her throat.

Your dreams, imaginings, a lunatic ravings don't come close to the sensation of her throat. Every spot on you body is held by Tiffany's flesh, which loving, tenderly, and gently strokes it, and you find yourself lost in pleasures you can't possibly describe. All around you is a beautiful girl, and she is giving you the best experience of your life, and showing you parts of herself few men would ever see, or really want to see truth be told. Still you aren't most men, and for you the time spent in her throat is one long tube ride of pleasure, one you wish would never end as Tiffany's body creases you, and numbs you to sleep through the steady bass beating of her heart.

Still nothing is forever, and without any kind of precursor you find yourself once again in a large open chamber, falling from a hole in the ceiling to the floor below. Inside her stomach you still find the smell pleasing for some reason, and as you enter the miasma you can't help but wonder if anyone could make a good perfume from this, though they probably wouldn't considering it wouldn't smell as good to most people because they would only smell it after it came up, not while it was still part of a sweet woman.

With a splash you find the bottom of her stomach, and the acid therein. You don't try to swim, but instead let the current push you back to the surface. Once there you find the gentle rocking motion soothing. You could stay here for the rest of your life, which you very well might. Looking around you can still see, but the only thing to see is the smooth stomach walls dripping acid and slowly moving in and out. You find your consciousness fading from the fumes, and that annoying voice is back telling you to try and live, but you ignore it for the second time, and let the slow, but deliberate orchestra of Tiffany's body, her breathing, her heart beat, and even the chewing sounds, take you into itself, and away from the concerns of the mundane.
121212211121211111.title: Ride of a lifetime

choices: The Tag works right, you appear in your apartment
Something's wrong, you appear somewhere else
1212122111212111111.content: The mundane refuses to let you go though, and a blinding light begins to fill your eyes, which you could swear had already dissolved. It quickly dawns on you that the Tachyon Tag must have worked, you're going to live through this, and that means you can do it again once Tiffany enters your apartment. Laying back, or at least mentally doing so, you await the moment the light fades, and then look around. Did the Tag work correctly?
1212122111212111111.title: The Tag works, but are you safe?

choices: Wait where you are, it seems safest
Tiffany doesn't seem the type to just barge in, so you have to go out to her
12121221112121111111.content:
The white light is gone from your vision, and you shout for joy after you find yourself in your own apartment. The Tag worked, and you got a really fun time out of it. You plan on trying for a second dive into Tiffany's gut as soon as you can. Maybe even tonight. You are so ecstatic about being alive that you are completely oblivious to the fact that things seem just a little too big around you, at least until a pounding can be heard washing over the scene like the banging on the gates of hell by some mammoth demon.

It takes you a moment to recover from the thunderous blasts, but when you finally do you look in horror at the gargantuan clock over your TV. It is a little past midnight, right when Tiffany showed up at your doorstep. The slams you heard were her fists on your door, and looking around it finally begins to dawn on you, that though this is your apartment, it is not right. Everything is much too large, and your perspective can't be more than a few millimeters off the tile floor of your living room.

Your glance around does tell you that you are better off than you were before though, as it seems that even though the Tag didn't return you to normal size, you are at least a bit bigger than you were before. The titan status has been revoked from the couch your sitting on, though mountain still applies. At least your safe for the moment, but you need the MA office and the antidote the possess, and right now Tiffany is your best link to that place. Getting up you hear the doorknob begin to rattle and you realize that you are faced with yet another life and death choice. Wait on the couch and hope Tiffany comes in on her own, or run to the door and try to get out somehow.
12121221112121111111.title: Home is where the heart is

choices: Get into the purse, maybe she'll stop by the MA office before going home
Try and get her attention while she's in your home
121212211121211111111.content:
Looking down at the floor you imagine being on it while someone is walking, and it causes you more than a little concern when your imagining ends with a loud crunching sound as your bones snap. With that image firmly in mind you decide that staying where you are is the best idea, as Tiffany might well come into your home. After all your door is unlocked, and in a way she was invited, so it wouldn't be to much of a stretch for her to at least stick her head in the door to call for you.

Sitting back down you look towards the door, hoping that you haven't misjudged Tiffany. You really hadn't spoken to her about herself. All you'd cared about was her job, and that was it. You never really took the time to ask her about herself. Maybe you should have thought more about her and less about yourself, but considering what she was supposed to do to you hadn't really wanted to get to know her. Well not unless you called on her services again.

The minutes tick by slowly, and looking up at the clock you can't help but think that maybe you were wrong about Tiffany as she had not stuck her head in, yet she also hadn't left, as you hadn't heard the roar of the engine of her car, which should be loud to your tiny ears. Getting more desperate with each movement of the clock's hands you are just about to run to the edge of the couch and jump down when a rattling sound is heard from your door.

As if she knew you were there and trying to build suspense Tiffany opens the door and peaks inside through a crack. Seeing her for the first time outlined by the light you realize that though you aren't normal size by any stretch of the imagination you are bigger than you were before. You're not sure by how much, but you'd guess that you're at least a quarter inch tall now, if not twice that, which might come in handy now.

"Tiffany! In here!" you shout, jumping around waving your arms. It's obvious she doesn't see you, as her eyes continue to dart around the room passing over you, but from the look in her eyes you'd have to say she heard you, if only barely. Striding purposefully Tiffany crosses the threshold into you home and looks around some more, as you continue to jump up and down waving your arms and screaming and waving your arms like a maniac.

"MR. MARSHALL?" she says into the house. The voice is booming to your ears, but you are more used to the noise this time, and cover them to prevent them from ringing, just as the last echo of her voice fades from the house you start waving your hands again instead of being doubled over in pain at the simple sound of her voice. Walking farther in she steps up to the couch, and for just a second you think she's seen you, but then she tosses her purse beside you and walks deeper into your home, trying to find you.

Looking after the titaness you can't help but feel powerless. You had been forced to scramble for cover when the great mass of her purse fell from the sky, almost right on top of you, and now she passes right next to you without finding you. Staring around you have to consider that she might not be able to find you before she decides to leave, but she has unknowingly provided a way to follow her by throwing the purse where she did.

Looking at it you can see a piece of string sticking out of one end like a rope, pulling on it you think it might be able to support your weight. The choice before you is simple. Climb into her purse and try to get her attention later, or someone else's at wherever she goes to from your house, or stay outside and try to get her attention here and now. You hear booming footsteps coming from the back of your house and decide to...
121212211121211111111.title: Hitching a ride?

choices: the MA office to log a report on the fac that you weren't in your home
her home for the night, putting off reporting your vanishing act until morning
1212122111212111111111.content:
Climbing up the purse is easier than you expected, and as you haul your tiny body up the rope you come to understand how it is that ants are able to lift so many times their own weight. You think to yourself that in proportion you can probably do a lot of things better than you were before, like running, jumping, or lifting. Still it is only in proportion, which means that it is still many times less than what you really could do at your normal size.

With a final grunt of effort you reach the top of Tiffany's purse. For a second you consider staying atop the item and trying once again to get her attention, but a stray jolt the translates from her footstep, through the floor, and finally up the couch causes a vibration that pulls you feet out from under you, and you fall face first into the depths of the darkened interior of Tiffany's purse. A hard pull in one direction sends you sliding across the cave like space, and you know Tiffany has picked up her purse, and a slamming sound indicates she has left your house, you are now in the outside world.

All in all the ride outside is quite pleasant, as the swaying motion of the purse reminds you of the pull and ebb that had been the motion of Tiffany's stomach. Looking up at her through the still unzipped purse you can't help but feel another tightness in your pants. She is just as radiant as ever, and now you can see her silhouetted by the lights outside, something you hadn't seen your first time traveling with her while in the needle.

The moment you reach her car you find that your preferences shift to the needle again as Tiffany, not knowing you are inside, throws the purse roughly into the passenger's seat, causing a tumultuous racket as things shift about, and forcing you to loop you arms so that you have firm grip on the wall. At least twice you are afraid a stray lipstick or makeup pad will crush your tiny body, but after a moment everything settles down and you breathe easier.

Your breath is let out in a scream however when you are shown the second reason you liked the needle better, the fact that it blocked the noise of the engine, which sends you sprawling to the floor of the purse gripping your ears in pain. The pain slowly fades, or at least you learn to get used to it as the motion of the bag resumes. Tiffany, though a seemingly careful driver, was still not careful enough to keep things from sliding around in her purse as she drove, and you are forced to run around frantically avoiding mundane things like makeup and loose change.

You're not sure how long this actually goes on, but you are surprised to notice that you haven't heard the radio at all. Tiffany is driving in complete silence. You can hear only the roar of the engine, the shriek of passing cars, and in the quieter moments you can hear the steady in and out of her breathing, and you think you can just barely make out the bass drum beating of her heart, which you remember from your time inside her.

Thinking about your voraephile experience with Tiffany you can't help but wish to do it again, but you know that it really would be the end of you this time, or at least you suspect so. According to the paper that had come with the Tachyon Tag it was originally called the Second Chance Tag, because it gave you a second chance at life, and that title seems to indicate that it would work only once, if that, and so you are quick to choose life this time rather than death, as the first time you had at least a fifty-fifty shot at survival, though you wouldn't have really cared what side the coin landed on in that scenario. This time however, your chances are probably less than one in ten, so getting help is paramount.
